short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the result page to only display products sold by bol.com (not third parties)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is specifically for Bol.com usage. It provides the possibility to filter items only sold by "Bol.com". Currently this is only possible when the url parameter contains the letter "l".
